text: Hagi anante Eliakimiki, Sibnaki, Joaki hu'za anankema nentahi'za, Asiria sondia vahete kva nera amanage hu'za asami'naze. Tagra eri'za vahekamota muse hugantonanki, Aramu kea antahi'nonanki, antahinoma kefinti tasamio, na'ankure kagrama Hibru tagerupinti'ma nerasaminanke'za, kuma keginamofo agofetu'ma mani'naza vahe'mo'za anankea antahigahaze.
